caption: Deploy DAO
doc: Deploy a on-chain voting DAO contract.

AMD.caption: Name
AMD.doc: The name of this DAO smart contract.
AMD.name: name

AME.caption: Token Address
AME.doc: This is the contract address of our governance token, a ERC-20 contract!
AME.name: token_address

AMF.caption: Voting Delay In Blocks
AMF.doc: After a proposal is created, how many blocks until users can start voting?
AMF.name: start_delay

AMG.caption: Voting Period In Blocks
AMG.doc: 1 day = 6570 blocks, 1 week = 45992 blocks. How many blocks do members have to vote on a proposal after it's created?
AMG.name: voting_blocks

AMH.caption: Voting Quorum Fraction
AMH.doc: The minimum % of the total supply that need to vote for the proposal to be valid after the time for the proposal has ended.
AMH.name: min_voters

AMI.caption: Proposal Token Threshold
AMI.doc: What's the minimum # of governance tokens a user needs to be allowed to create a proposal?
AMI.name: min_tokens

AMJ.caption: The following parameters are specified in number of blocks, assuming a block time of around 13.14 seconds for Ethereum.
AMJ.name: info

ANN.caption: Image
ANN.doc: The image of this DAO smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this DAO smart contract on a block explorer.
ANN.name: image
